archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: INFUSE Flow (Bitrix24)
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Goal: Optimize the workflow of different teams with the automation tools of INFUSE Flow platform to increase productivity of those teams.
Key Features: - CRM (deals, web forms, reports, flow automation, open channels integration, website widget) - Project Management (tasks, subtasks, Gantt, kanban, dependencies, recurring tasks & task time-tracking) - Time Management (work time automatic calculation & summary, work reports, shared calendars) - HR (employee directory, company structure, absence chart & leave request workflow, announcements & appreciation badges)
